text: Toast one side of each slice of bread. Leave the other side untoasted. Mix equal amounts of grated/shredded cheese and butter or oil together. Make enough to spread on one side of each slice. Spread the cheese and fat mixture on the untoasted side of each bread slice. Spread it as evenly as possible. Place each piece of bread under the griller/broiler. Face the cheese side upward. Brown gently. Remove from the heat source. Cut into crouton sized squares when cool enough to handle. Serve immediately. Sprinkle on soup and serve.
